taxon_name.authority: R. L. Carr & G. D. Carr

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Asteraceae;tribe Heliantheae;subtribe Madiinae;genus Calycadenia;species micrantha;

bio:treatment.discussion: Calycadenia micrantha is most closely related to variants of C. truncata and is found in the North Coast Range from Trinity County to Lake and Colusa counties. Calycadenia truncata subsp. microcephala H. M. Hall ex D. D. Keck may be a synonym of C. micrantha. D. D. Keck (1960b) reported this to be on the east slope of the Santa Lucia Mountains of Monterey County.
